o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_EntityExampleData_EditExampleEntity
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) Dim objSel : Set objSel = obj.Model.CreateSelection
If Not(objSel Is Nothing) Then Dim objSourceEntity For Each objSourceEntity in obj.ParentObject.ParentObject.SourceClassifiers ' Skip business rules without mapping. Dim objRealSourceEntity : Set objRealSourceEntity = GetRealObject(objSourceEntity) If Not(objRealSourceEntity.HasStereotype("mdde_BusinessRuleWithoutMapping")) Then objSel.Objects.Add objSourceEntity End If Next
' Display the object picker on the selection Dim objExampleEntity : Set objExampleEntity = objSel.ShowObjectPicker ' Remove the selection. objSel.Delete
' If an example entity is selected, story it. If Not(objExampleEntity Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_ExampleEntity", objExampleEntity End If
End If End Sub
